name: Fantasy Mosaics 34: Zen Garden
description:
The penguin family finally discovered a new way to play mosaic puzzles!

Let's join them on their journey to a beautiful zen garden and help them explore the landscape!

Enjoy new mini games and discover subtle challenges the new game mode has to offer!


- Explore the new Zen game mode

- Gameplay featuring secret colors

- New colorful mosaic puzzles

- Puzzles based on logic
